Text.Page:
The shurians and their blasted allies are wreaking havoc. We need you to put an end to their efforts.

The {@LinkCreature:4#3031#tyraks}, {@LinkCreature:4#3041#shurian mindbenders}, and {@LinkCreature:4#3042#hellion thralls} must be slain.

Report to Tifane at Firebase Valor when mission is complete.
You've done really wonderful work here. We appreciate the help!
You came to help, I assume? Maybe you should get to that.
